quest.name: In Mt. Gulg's Shadow
journal: Alisaie is eager to get on with the task.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I'm pleased to see that the villagers are no longer wary of us. I shall take the opportunity to ask about Mt. Gulg.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Yet another hapless soul that Alphinaud saved from mortal danger, I see. Some things never change.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: At any rate, it seems that Brother has a mind to linger. Meanwhile, I have a mind for us to explore.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Forename and I are going to scout out the area. We'll be back in a while.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: O-Oh? Very well, then. Just take care out there.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Take care out there. If you sense even the slightest danger, pray turn back at once.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The path diverges. Let's split up so we can cover more ground. I'll go east if you would be so kind as to head west.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We can aim to meet at the foot of the mountain, taking note of what we see along the way. In a short while, then.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You are under attack!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Soon after you left, who should arrive in Amity but Urianger and the Exarch. I'm glad they were able to find you.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I'm told you went ahead to scout out the volcano. I don't suppose some grappling hooks will suffice?

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: A-All that grinding and shaking... I-I was afraid the lift floor would fall out from underneath me...

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: B-But don't worry! I-I'm sure the trembling will go away s-soon!

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Thus are we all gathered...though Ryne, I am afeared, did not much enjoy the ascent.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Forgive us our delay. The Exarch arrived and we took some time to apprise him of our mission.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYVOICE
dialogue.text: ...Concerned for my health, are you? Indeed, we are a little far from the Crystarium, but rest assured this old man can muster up another wind for what is to come.

dialogue.name: CHAINUZZ
dialogue.text: Oh, don't mind us. We're just taking in the sights.

dialogue.name: DULIACHAI
dialogue.text: Ahhh, such an exhilarating ride! And such a magnificent view! Nothing in Eulmore compares to this!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Hm... I didn't expect to see the Chais here. Though I suppose it's well within their rights.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: At any rate, it's time to tackle our next little obstacle: finding a way to reach Mt. Gulg.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: For this, we'll need to put all our heads together...
